What is the synonym for the word "tiny" in the following XML data?
<thesaurus>
<word>
<term>small</term>
<term>little</term>
<term>petite</term>
</word>
<word>
<term>big</term>
<term>large</term>
<term>huge</term>
</word>
<word>
<term>old</term>
<term>ancient</term>
<term>prehistoric</term>
</word>
</thesaurus>

In the provided XML data, the synonyms for the word "tiny" would be found in the first `<word>` element. The synonyms listed there are:

- small
- little
- petite
